name: Adarsh Kumar
college: Noida institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: Talented Software Developer with expertise in coding, debugging, and project management. Consistently achieves project goals through elegant and scalable code. Collaborates effectively within Agile and Scrum frameworks.

education.school: Noida institute of Engineering and Technology
education.degree: bachelors of technology in Computer Science & Technology

projects.name: Smart Attendance System
projects.description: Developed a Smart Attendance System using Machine Learning to automate attendance tracking. Implemented facial recognition (or RFID, biometric, etc.) to accurately identify students/employees and record attendance in real-time.

projects.name: Stock Market Prediction using Machine Learning Techniques
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Stock Market Prediction model utilizing machine learning techniques to analyze historical data and predict future stock prices. Employed algorithms such as Linear Regression, Random Forest, and LSTM for time-series forecasting.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Developed a Library Management System using Java to automate book borrowing and returning processes. Implemented features for user registration, book search, and inventory management using Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. Utilized Java Swing for GUI development and MySQL for backend data storage.

experiences.description: Performed exploratory data analysis on large datasets to identify trends and outliers. Assisted in analyzing and interpreting large datasets using SQL and Excel to support data-driven decision-making across various departments.
Developed web applications using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Assisted in developing and creating portfolio for clients.

full_output.name: Adarsh Kumar

degree: bachelors of technology in Computer Science & Technology
